# uuid

**Instance Property**

The device’s unique identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
var uuid: UUID { get }
```

## Discussion

This is the identifier the system creates from device configuration objects that conform to [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZUSBDeviceConfiguration].

## Properties

- **usbController**: The USB controller that has an attachment to the device.

items.description: The USB controller that has an attachment to the device.
